text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in Sendai.Soccerway.com, "Vegalta Sendai"; retrieved 2012-3-2. ==History== The club was founded in 1988. * 1988-1994 Tohoku Electric Power SC * 1995-1998 Brummell Sendai * 1999-present Vegalta Sendai == League title== *J2 League : 1 **2010 == League position == *2011 : J1 League - 4th *2012 : J1 League - 2nd *2013 : J1 League - 13th *2014 : J1 League - 14th *2015 : J1 League - 14th *2016 : J1 League - 12th *2017 : J1 League - 12th *2018 : J1 League - 11th *2019 : J1 League - 11th *2020 : J1 League - 17th ===Former position=== ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Vegalta Sendai players == References == ==Other websites== * Vegalta Sendai website * J.League Club Guide Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Sports organizations in Sendai, Miyagi
